mapper.sql: User.ID as ID ,User.Name as Name,User.Phone as Phone,User.Password as Password, Authority.ID as Authority_ID,Authority.Position as Position
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user.Phone, user.Password, user.Name ) VALUES (#{phone}, #{password},#{name})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM user,Authority WHERE user.Authority_ID = Authority.ID AND user.ID = #{id}
